title: Seeing Prayer as a Conversation
itunes:author: Guest: Jodie Berndt
itunes:summary:
In the same way that you enjoy having good conversations with your kids, God wants to talk to you. But how do you make prayer a consistent part of your life? John and Danny discuss the power of prayer, and how praying for their children has changed as their kids have grown. Featuring Jodie Berndt.


Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.


Receive Jodie Berndt's book "Praying the Scriptures for your Children" for your donation of any amount:

https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2022-05-17?refcd=1465801


Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/seeing-prayer-as-a-conversation/#featured-resource-cta


Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/praying-scripture-over-your-child-s-life-digital/?refcd=1465801


If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
